# The `AVRMCCodeEmitter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Writes <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> machine code to a stream. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Writes <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> machine code to a stream.

### getMachineOpValue() {#ac561c265a8eb5f9d734d0dfd964e7a34}

  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::AVRMCCodeEmitter::getMachineOpValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp; MO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &gt; &amp; Fixups, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI) const</>}>
Returns the binary encoding of operand.

If the machine operand requires relocation, the relocation is recorded and zero is returned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrmccodeemitter-h/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrmccodeemitter-h">AVRMCCodeEmitter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### loadStorePostEncoder() {#af2b044eeb8a9c6627ab1eb863b5d4ea8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::AVRMCCodeEmitter::loadStorePostEncoder (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, unsigned EncodedValue, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI) const</>}>
Finishes up encoding an LD/ST instruction.

The purpose of this function is to set an bit in the instruction which follows no logical pattern. See the implementation for details.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrmccodeemitter-h/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrmccodeemitter-h">AVRMCCodeEmitter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
